title: Looking for grinders bronze-silver or higher
body:
I can fill wherever i like a bit of adc,top,mid in no order.

Add me asap Voice communication is fine by me.

replies.body: add me, bronze 5 atm but i go up and down to b2 a lot, PatrikkStar

l was recently in Silver V but dropped Due to bad teammates and now i'm currently in Bronze, l'm a Yasuo main but i play a lot of Zed aswell. My summoner name is GeT L3fT add me or Invite me if you wanna duoq

@ Grey 
S5 - Jungle Main if you're keen.
hey dude im down to grind with u guys
Yeh Im keen to grind back up gold, s3 atm I'll play sup if you adc or jg if u want to top or mid
